definitions.definition: An alcoholic drink fermented from starch material, commonly barley malt, often with hops or some other substance to impart a bitter flavor.
definitions.example: Beer is brewed all over the world.

definitions.definition: A fermented extract of the roots and other parts of various plants, as spruce, ginger, sassafras, etc.
A solution produced by steeping plant materials in water or another fluid.
A glass, bottle, or can of any of the above beverages.
definitions.example: Can I buy you a beer?

definitions.definition: A variety of the above beverages.
definitions.example: I haven't tried this beer before.
